name: Revenge
description: Deal 10 damage. If you received damage this turn, that damage is added to this attack.

immediateEffect.script: int baseDamage = 10; int damageTaken = Player.MaxHP - Player.CurrentHP; int bonusDamage = Math.Min(damageTaken, 50); DealDamage(Opponent, baseDamage + bonusDamage);
